items.sentence: I had no doubt that Tom would do what we asked.
I have a friend whose father is a famous actor.
Tom and his father built a tree house together.
Tom believes in equality between women and men.
Tom came on Monday and went back the day after.
Tom checked the answering machine for messages.
I can\'t believe that you like that restaurant.
I can\'t draw, but my sister is a great artist.
I can\'t figure out how to get the window open.
Tom called me yesterday at nine in the morning.
